thread.title: National Security Adviser Michael Flynn: ‘As of Today, We Are Officially Putting Iran on Notice’
thread.title_full: National Security Adviser Michael Flynn: ‘As of Today, We Are Officially Putting Iran on Notice’

author: Justin Baragona
title: National Security Adviser Michael Flynn: ‘As of Today, We Are Officially Putting Iran on Notice’
text:
National Security Adviser Michael Flynn: ‘As of Today, We Are Officially Putting Iran on Notice’ by Justin Baragona | 2:26 pm, February 1st, 2017 Video 
At the beginning of today’s White House press briefing, National Security Adviser Michael Flynn made a brief statement regarding a recent ballistic missile test conducted by Iran. 
Flynn explained that that the “Obama Administration failed to respond adequately to Tehran’s actions” and that the “Trump Administration condemns such actions by Iran that undermine security, stability and prosperity throughout the Middle East.” 
The NSA further stated that President Donald Trump has criticized agreements reached by Obama as being “weak and ineffective.” 
“As of today, we are officially putting Iran on notice,” Flynn concluded. 
Watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[image via screengrab]
